/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the middle of the street, providing a broad perspective of the urban landscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their glass facades reflecting the light, and lush green trees that add a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. Cars and buses navigate the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, connecting different parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, casting a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
